name: The Weeping Chronicler’s Tale of Cursed Volaria
name_original: The Weeping Chronicler’s Tale of Cursed Volaria
description:
The Weeping Chronicler’s Tale of Cursed Volaria

Created for the AdvXJam 2021. 

A brave knight of the gods ventures deep into the lands of cursed Volaria, where he uncovers the secrets of the kingdom's demise.
